alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lake and west central Orange Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 212 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ferndale, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tavares, Groveland, Mascotte, Howey-In-the-hills and Lake Apopka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
